WorkItem.ClosedComment: all grammars in Samples assembly are SAMPLES, not real things
WorkItem.Description:
The following common/simple SQL syntax blows up the SQL sample grammar:

SELECT j.*
FROM Jobs j
JOIN Employees e ON e.EmployeeID = j.EmployeeID
WHERE 1 = e.Enabled

The parser doesn't like the table aliases:  j, e
WorkItem.Summary: SQL Sample grammar is incomplete; Table aliases are unsuppoorted

Comments.Message: this is a SAMPLE, not a real thing. closing as not an issue
